title: Mortgage Calculator
description: Developed a simple mortgage calculator app using React.js, TailwindCSS. Basic concepts of React js such as Components, Hooks and Styling are covered in this project.

title: Weather App
description: Built a responsive weather app using React.js, HTML5, and CSS, displaying real-time weather data from OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Responsive Search bar
description: Developed a basic responsive search bar that gives instant suggestions on what text you input inside the search bar. Used Reactjs, CSS, and JavaScript for this project.
